instructor module¶

class instructor.Instructor(name, age, email, instructor_id)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents an instructor in the school management system.

This class represents an instructor with their personal details and the list of courses they are assigned to teach.

name¶

The name of the instructor.

Type:

str

age¶

The age of the instructor.

Type:

int

_email¶

The private email of the instructor (use the get_email method to access).

Type:

str

instructor_id¶

The unique ID of the instructor.

Type:

int

assigned_courses¶

A list of courses assigned to the instructor.

Type:

list

get_email()[source]¶

Returns the instructor’s email.

assign_course(course)[source]¶

Assigns a course to the instructor if it has not already been assigned.

assign_course(course)[source]¶

Assigns a course to this instructor.

Parameters:

course (Course) – The course to be assigned to the instructor.

get_email()[source]¶

Returns the instructor’s email.

This method provides access to the instructor’s private email attribute.

Returns:

The email address of the instructor.

Return type:

str

School Management System
